mapper.select: select pp.id, pp.aid, pp.photo, pp.title, pp.uid, pp.supportNums ,pp.createTime,pp.examine, pp.nickName,pp.headerimg, mp.mid,mp.muid,mp.miid, mp.maid, mp.mmessageInfo,mp.mcreateTime, mp.mnickName,mp.mheaderimg FROM (select a.id, a.aid, a.photo, a.title, a.uid, a.support_nums as supportNums ,a.create_time as createTime,a.examine, b.nickname as nickName,b.headerimg FROM zl_vote_project as a left join zl_customer as b on b.id = a.uid WHERE a.aid = #{activityId} order by a.support_nums desc,a.create_time desc limit #{currentPage},#{pageSize}) as pp left join (select c.id as mid,c.uid as muid,c.iid as miid, c.aid as maid, c.message_info as mmessageInfo,c.create_time as mcreateTime, d.nickname as mnickName,d.headerimg as mheaderimg from zl_vote_project_message as c left join zl_customer as d on d.id = c.uid WHERE c.aid = #{activityId} order by c.create_time desc ) as mp ON mp.miid = pp.id WHERE 1 = 1
